thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 26 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-SBA Communications Corp Reports Q4 Adjusted FFO Per Share $1.78

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-SBA Communications Corp Reports Q4 Adjusted FFO Per Share $1.78
text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - Sba Communications Corp:
* ORATION REPORTS 4TH QUARTER 2017 RESULTS; PROVIDES FULL YEAR 2018 OUTLOOK
* Q4 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $1.78 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 6.4 PERCENT TO $443.1 MILLION * QTRLY ‍AFFO PER SHARE $1.78​ * SEES ‍FULL YEAR 2018 AFFO PER SHARE $ 7.27 TO $ 7.67​ * SEES ‍FULL YEAR 2018 TOTAL REVENUES $ 1,830.0 MILLION TO $ 1,870.0 MILLION ​
* SEES ‍FULL YEAR 2018 DISCRETIONARY CASH CAPITAL EXPENDITURES $ 530.0 MILLION TO $ 550.0 MILLION ​
* Q4 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $1.74 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $7.66 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
